column6:
Tensions mount at Thunderbolts Mountain as the conflict between the prisoners and the T-Bolts worsens. Is there a plan at work? And with so many super-villains in one place, things won't stay peaceful for long!,2008,3
32 PGS./Rated T+ ...$2.99
column8: | colorist:Rainier Beredo | inker:Mike Deodato | penciller (cover):Marko Djurdjevic | writer:Warren Ellis | letterer:Richard Starkings
